author: MSNBC
title: Trump's withdrawal from the Iran nuclear deal has been vindicated
description: When Trump pulled out of the Iran nuclear deal, critics said it would make things worse. But more sanctions have made the world safer.
content:
President Donald Trump signs a document reinstating sanctions against Iran after announcing the U.S. withdrawal from the Iran nuclear deal at the White House on May 8, 2018.

Saul Loeb / AFP - Getty Images file
